sections.title: Cloud Infrastructure Migration
sections.description: Seamlessly move to the cloud with our Terraform experts. We ensure smooth transitions with security and automation built in.
offerings: Identify the right cloud platform aligned with your business goals.
Set up secure cloud accounts with industry best practices.
Migrate your workloads to AWS, Azure, GCP, or hybrid setups with Terraform automation.

sections.title: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) Management
sections.description: Simplify infrastructure management with Terraform’s declarative IaC model.
offerings: Provision and manage infra with HashiCorp Configuration Language (HCL).
Version and import existing infra into Git-backed repositories.
Automate updates and scaling using reusable Terraform modules.
Optimize infrastructure cost and performance with automated pipelines.

sections.title: Kubernetes Multi-Cloud Management
sections.description: Integrate Terraform with Kubernetes to orchestrate infrastructure and workloads across any cloud provider.
offerings: Deploy and manage K8s clusters on AWS, Azure, GCP, and hybrid clouds.
Automate environment setup and cluster scaling using Terraform modules.

sections.title: Adopt Terraform Cloud or Enterprise
sections.description: Select and implement the right Terraform edition for your team — Cloud or Enterprise — with our guidance.
offerings: Terraform Cloud enables shared state, secrets, and policy-based controls for teams.
Terraform Enterprise offers a self-hosted, compliance-ready solution with advanced governance.

sections.title: Keep Terraform Code DRY with Terragrunt
sections.description: Reduce code duplication and simplify configuration management using Terragrunt best practices.
